name: Persian
food_recommendation: High-protein food with a mix of wet and dry options suitable for Persian cats, which thrive in moderate temperatures.

name: Siamese
food_recommendation: Siamese cats require a balanced diet with high-quality protein and fiber, particularly in hot climates, to maintain hydration.

name: Bengal
food_recommendation: Bengals need high-energy, protein-packed meals. They thrive on foods with essential fatty acids, especially for active lifestyles.

name: British Shorthair
food_recommendation: A well-rounded diet with a mix of wet and dry food is suitable for British Shorthairs, especially in colder climates. In Pakistan's hot regions, ensure hydration and portion control.

name: Maine Coon
food_recommendation: Maine Coons need high-protein, calorie-dense food due to their large size. They also require hydration to help cope with warmer climates.

name: Birman
food_recommendation: Birman cats require food with a balanced nutrient profile, and in hot weather, itâ€™s important to ensure proper hydration and reduce feeding during the peak heat of the day.

name: Ragdoll
food_recommendation: Ragdolls are large and affectionate cats, requiring a high-calorie diet with fatty acids, protein, and carbohydrates, ideal for their size and activity level.
